solution_line_template: There were {total_voters}-{john_votes}=<<{total_voters}-{john_votes}={remaining_after_john}>>{remaining_after_john} people who didn't vote for John
So the other candidate got {remaining_after_john}-{james_votes}=<<{remaining_after_john}-{james_votes}={third_candidate_votes}>>{third_candidate_votes} votes
This means he got {third_candidate_votes}-{john_votes}=<<{third_candidate_votes}-{john_votes}={vote_difference}>>{vote_difference} more votes than John.
